assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Written consent was obtained from each participant for access to clinical data and participation to DNA analyses (DIVAT n° CNIL 914184). Patients and/or the public were not involved in the design, or conduct, or reporting, or dissemination plans of this research.
